content.title: Venous Malformation Sclerotherapy
content.description: Percutaneous sclerotherapy for low-flow venous malformations

key_concepts.details: Symptomatic venous malformations causing pain, functional impairment, cosmetic concerns
Ethanol, sodium tetradecyl sulfate (STS), polidocanol, bleomycin
Direct puncture under ultrasound or fluoroscopic guidance; venography to assess drainage
Multiple sessions often required; improvement in 80-90% but complete resolution uncommon

content.clinical_significance: Sclerotherapy is first-line treatment for symptomatic venous malformations
